hambanthota podu rajya mandalaye sabhapathiwaraya niyojanaya karana disthrikkaya menma sak kalapaye hitapu sabhapathiwaraya wana janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha niyojanaya karana bala pradeshaya da wanawa.

meyata pera, gasa, hamudamaya adhiwasayata lak wi thibu athara, itha mathadi eeshrayelaya wisin (1967-1994) saha eejipthuwa (1958-1967) wisinda, peradi otoman adhirajyaye kotasak wa pawathiyadi siriyawa wisinda eya palanaya wiya. 2007di patan, gasa thiraya thaththwakarayen palanaya wuye, palasthiniyanu jathika adhikariye saha palasthiniyanu janathawage niyojithayan lesata himikam pana palasthina kandayamak wana hamas wisini. 2012di, eksath jathinge maha mandalaya wisin "eksath jathin thula samajikayek-nowana nirikshaka thaththwaya, palasthinaya wetha pradanaya karana ladi".
namuth meyala uthure aya pamanak newe.
